Articles.Content:
Hi so this is my first Build i worked like 4 hours on it to get it in perfect symmettry and not spinning, it takes off with gravity hack and fuel hack, but it is solid and you can turn those off when you're in space, it has Ion thrusters perma regen, so even if you run out of liquid fuel you still got something for those long runs. I didn't like the starwars ships i downloaded tested by Manley , so i'm starting my new series, this is the first of the series.

It also has horizontal landing/take off (the vertical ion thruster are bound to custom action 1 and horizontal 2) and like 100 lights that lag when you turn em on , so you can remove em quite quickly as they are paired. maybe a little too much rcs that also has a performance issue, so remove the ones you dont want. I really like the red ones for the "blasters".

Except for the wings and engines which took a LOT of time to get right since the engines wouldn't get in a nice position , the rest is totally rearrangeable to your liking.

So i hope you like it and if not tell me what to change and i will.

Next one is Jedi starfighter with docking/undocking ring.

Here are the mods i use i don't know if they all apply for this one tho : B9 aerospace ; procedural fairings ; KW rocketry ; IonHybElec ; Interstellar. I don't think there's anything from interstellar but i'm not sure.

Next one is Jedi starfighter with docking/undocking ring. And hopefully warp speed if i can figure out how it works.

Thanks for your feedback .

And i hope you enjoy it and stay tuned for the next one.

Here are some more screenshots and the DL link.

http://mrbutterfl7.imgur.com

http://www./view/p8e65lkpya838q3/Most_epic_XWING_openable_cockpit.craft
This is definately a nice design, though for future uploads you should consider adding pictures in the VAB.
Thank you ! What is the Vab ? I'm sorry if i sound stupid.
The VAB is the Vehicle Assembly Building, that's the building that you use to build rockets, the Space Plane Hanger (SPH) would also work, there is much better lighting in there.
Ah yes , thank you for the tip ! I didn't think about it. I was trying to reproduce the feel of the movies in the SC's , but i will add them asap. Thanks again
Not a Star Wars fan, but that is very pretty! Nice job.
Thanks a lot, I'm glad you're not a fan you're more objective :=) . Vab pics are uploaded now if you want.

nice... I went for a slightly more compact design on my .18 XWing, it uses Super Atomics so is well capable of SSTO.

I'm going to do an updated design (.23 fresh install because everything just went A over T).
